resources.string: Settings
Incoming calls are automatically answered when you put the phone near your ear
Easy Answer
Apps in the list will be able to use following functions: wave your hand up/down over the earpiece to simulater swipe operation in the apps

Please turn on the switch on the top right corner to use customized air gestures, customized air gestures allows you to operate inside applications by waving your hand. Wave your hand up/down above the earpiece to simulate swipe operation inside an application.
